Functions

PDS_DataServerState_t PDS_SetToDefault (void)
 Writes default values of parameters to EEPROM.
void PDS_FlushData (void)
 Must be called from the APL_TaskHandler() function only.
The function forces writing data from ConfigServer to EEPROM. After returning from the function all ConfigServer data is stored in EEPROM.
void PDS_Stop (void)
 Must be called from the APL_TaskHandler() function only.
Stops Persist Data Server.
PDS_DataServerState_t PDS_ReadUserData (uint16_t offset, uint8_t *data, uint16_t length, void(*callback)(void))
 Must be called from the APL_TaskHandler() function only.
Reads data from the user area of EEPROM.
PDS_DataServerState_t PDS_WriteUserData (uint16_t offset, uint8_t *data, uint16_t length, void(*callback)(void))
 Must be called only from APL_TaskHandler() function.
Writes data to user area of EEPROM.

Detailed Description

The header file describes the Persistence Data Server interface.

Definition in file pdsDataServer.h.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum PDS_DataServerState_t

PDS state result after a command call.

Enumerator:
PDS_SUCCESS 
  • Command completed successfully
PDS_EEPROM_ERROR 
  • EEPROM error occurred
PDS_CRC_ERROR 
  • Wrong CRC
PDS_COMMIT_IN_PROGRESS 
  • Commit to external memory started

Definition at line 31 of file pdsDataServer.h.

Function Documentation

PDS_DataServerState_t PDS_SetToDefault ( void  )

Writes default values of parameters to EEPROM.

Returns:
- PDS state as a result of setting parameters to default state
PDS_DataServerState_t PDS_ReadUserData ( uint16_t  offset,
uint8_t *  data,
uint16_t  length,
void(*)(void)  callback 
)

Must be called from the APL_TaskHandler() function only.
Reads data from the user area of EEPROM.

Parameters:
[in]offset- data offset
[in]data- pointer to user data area
[in]length- data length
[in]callback- pointer to a callback function; if callback is NULL, then data will be read syncronously
Returns:
- PDS state as a result of data reading operation
PDS_DataServerState_t PDS_WriteUserData ( uint16_t  offset,
uint8_t *  data,
uint16_t  length,
void(*)(void)  callback 
)

Must be called only from APL_TaskHandler() function.
Writes data to user area of EEPROM.

Parameters:
[in]offset- data offset
[in]data- pointer to user data area
[in]length- data length
[in]callback- pointer to a callback function; if callback is NULL, then data will be written syncronously
Returns:
- PDS state as a result of data writing operation
